title: Microgels let medical implants fight off bacteria

title_detail.value: Microgels let medical implants fight off bacteria

summary: Joint replacement implants dipped in microgel flecks -- and then into a charged solution -- can release micro-doses of antibiotics when bacteria approach. The work could play a role in sharply reducing infection rates in one of the most common elective surgeries.
